sv:property.sv:value: Please enter your Employer’s PAN. You can find this on your Form 16 under “Name and Address of Employer” Top Left. Example AAACA1111A.
Please enter your Employer’s TAN. You can find this on your Form 16 under “Name and Address of Employer” Top Left. Example MUML00124A.
Enter PIN Code of Employer as provided in Form 16 under “Name and Address of Employer” Top Left.
Select The Period w.e.f. which you were employed with this employer, if serving since beginning then select first day of financial year.
Calculate relief u/s 89 as per IT Act in case of reciept of arrears of salary or advances of salary recieved during the year
Enter the Name of Tenant residing in your property.
Enter the address of your house property.
Enter the City in which given house property is situated.
Select the state in which this house is located.
Enter the % share own by you in given property
Please enter PAN no. printed on your PAN card which is 10 digit alphanumeric format
Please enter your surname, if no then please enter your name here.
Whether the return was filed within Due Date
Enter six digit pin code (NRI can enter 999999)
Enter your best communicable Email Address here
For Example : For SBI Account the IFSC Code will be as SBIN0123456
Portugese Civil Code is in force in states of Goa, Union Territories of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu

PSU: Organization which are Government-owned corporation (with 51%) which are “not privatized” Eg. ONGC, BHEL, NTPC, SAIL, SBI.

GOVT: Public enterprise incorporated under the Indian Companies Act, 1956 and owned and managed by the central or the state government or by both. Eg. Bharat Petroleum, Air India
For Example : For SBI Account the IFSC Code will be as SBIN0123456
In case the Unique TDS certificate No is 6 digits, please prefix 2 zeros. Also, the TDS No. should be 8 characters
Enter the BSR code of the bank, as mentioned in your challan or on e-payment acknowledgement
Enter the Challan no, as mentioned in your challan or on e-payment acknowledgement
Enter the amount of Advance tax paid
If you do not have PAN, then please use PAN as "GGGGG0000G"
Enter the BSR code of the bank, as mentioned in your challan or on e-payment acknowledgement
Enter the Challan no, as mentioned in your challan or on e-payment acknowledgement
ENter the amount of Self Assessment tax paid
this is Screen calculation for otherincome
